title: Installation issue: problem building gobject-introspection with python@3.9.0
body:
I'm not in a place where I can fix this right now, but thought I'd leave note for my future self, or whomever else comes along.

```
$ spack install r^python@3.9.0
[+] /local_scratch/george.hartzell/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-skylake_avx512/gcc-8.4.0/libiconv-1.16-gxhwn4i3pmaieairp27f7dphdysssabc
[...]
[+] /local_scratch/george.hartzell/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-skylake_avx512/gcc-8.4.0/harfbuzz-2.6.8-2dh6pc6xvjdr33iybm73y362ypjyf6np
==> Installing gobject-introspection-1.56.1-r3kbxpmegyto6nwuxpiemqnzkkqqxnpt
==> No binary for gobject-introspection-1.56.1-r3kbxpmegyto6nwuxpiemqnzkkqqxnpt found: installing from source
==> Fetching https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/_source-cache/archive/5b/5b2875ccff99ff7baab63a34b67f8c920def240e178ff50add809e267d9ea24b.tar.xz
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> gobject-introspection: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j64'

3 errors found in build log:
     303        self.parse_tree(tree)
     304      File "./giscanner/girparser.py", line 73, in parse_tree
     305        self._parse_api(tree.getroot())
     306      File "./giscanner/girparser.py", line 110, in _parse_api
     307        for node in root.getchildren():
     308    AttributeError: 'xml.etree.ElementTree.Element' object has no attribute 'getchildren'
  >> 309    make[2]: *** [GLib-2.0.gir] Error 1
     310    make[2]: Leaving directory `/local_scratch/george.hartzell/tmp/spack/var/spack/stage/spack-stage-gobject-introspection-1.56.1-r3kbxpmegyto6nwuxpiemqnzkkqqxnpt/spack-src'
  >> 311    make[1]: *** [all-recursive] Error 1
     312    make[1]: Leaving directory `/local_scratch/george.hartzell/tmp/spack/var/spack/stage/spack-stage-gobject-introspection-1.56.1-r3kbxpmegyto6nwuxpiemqnzkkqqxnpt/spack-src'
  >> 313    make: *** [all] Error 2

See build log for details:
  /local_scratch/george.hartzell/tmp/spack/var/spack/stage/spack-stage-gobject-introspection-1.56.1-r3kbxpmegyto6nwuxpiemqnzkkqqxnpt/spack-build-out.txt

==> Warning: Skipping build of pango-1.41.0-277jbjoyxydxyabvl7cxk4lzxqrjmoio since gobject-introspection-1.56.1-r3kbxpmegyto6nwuxpiemqnzkkqqxnpt failed
==> Warning: Skipping build of r-3.6.3-yvfwud4fg2gvhh7z4dc33am7gqn6u2wg since pango-1.41.0-277jbjoyxydxyabvl7cxk4lzxqrjmoio failed
$
```

The problem seems to be the one discussed in [gobject-introspection issue #325](https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/gobject-introspection/-/issues/325).  It seems like that fix was merged about a year ago.

There have been many new releases of gobject-introspection since our last version.  I tried getting `@1.66.1` to build but it no longer uses autotools and my naive attempts at building it manually with `meson` didn't get very far.

This seems like it might be another package that needs to support different build systems at different versions.
